```{r}
library(tidyverse)
tomato <- read_delim("tomatoes-greenhouse.csv")
tomato
```
```{r}
tomato %>%
  ggplot(aes(age, size, col = temperature)) +
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()
```
```{r}

tomato %>% 
  ggplot(aes(age, size,
             col = temperature
             ,group = plant))+
  geom_line(col = "gray") +
  geom_point(aes(col = temperature))

```


```{r}
orange <- read_delim("orange-trees (1).csv")
orange
```
```{r}
orange %>% 
  sample_n(4)
```

```{r}
orange %>% 
  group_by(tree) %>% 
  filter(rank(desc(age)) == 1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(tree, circumference,
             fill = factor(tree))) +
  geom_col()
```
